sources.title: "Babes and Boobs" (1918) starring Larry Semon
sources.description: This gem is presented by Silent Hall of Fame.   Please visit https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/   to support our non-profit mission and the legacy of silent movie stars by making a tax deductible contribution.   FEEL FREE TO FOLLOW US ON TWITTER @SilentFilmGems     This is a short preview. You can watch the whole film here: https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/index.php/gems-for-donation   This film is part of our brand new Larry Semon collection of short comedies. Please see below important details about this collection. "Babes and Boobs" is a short comedy directed by Larry Semon starring Larry Semon, Madge Kirby, Frank Alexander and others. A Special Announcement As part of our Silent Gems Collection of rare high quality films we have released a set of discs named: Endless Slapstick. Larry Semon: The Ultimate Collection Highlights of this exclusive and unique collection: 1/ this is the most comprehensive Larry Semon collection ever released - it includes no less than 61 short comedies on 13 DVDs. 2/ almost half of these films have never been available on home video. 3/ most of these films are brand new high resolution transfers made with cutting-edge true frame-by-frame scanning technology, offering superior quality compared to other releases. 4/ many of these films are transfers combined from more than one source print and include numerous scenes that have never been available for viewing in other releases; thus, the films in our collection represent the most complete versions possible. 5/ Larry Semon is just one of a whole constellation of stars, in particular, Oliver Hardy stars in 21 films, Stan Laurel in 3 other films, and Monty Banks in still one other film. 6/ Larry Semon fans will be delighted with this new exclusive collection, which offers 23 hours of mirth from sidesplitting slapstick!

metadata.Plot: A young couple and their new baby are walking down the street when the wife decides to stop in at a store, and the husband agrees to wait outside with the baby in the carriage. He spots a pretty maid sitting on a bench with a baby in the same kind of carriage and goes over to flirt with her. Meanwhile, a black lady pushing a baby also in the same kind of carriage leaves it in front of the store and goes in. Matters are further complicated when one of the carriages is stolen by kidnappers.
metadata.Actors: Larry Semon, Madge Kirby, Frank Alexander
